creator: jvleliev@xs4all.nl
text:
When use only apache on a WIN98 (second edition) machine this machine hangs 
several times a day. Sometimes addressability on exceptions are reported but in 
most cases nothing is reported at all.

And do you have any particular evidence that it is apache causing the hang?

There is certainly not enough information in this bug report for us to provide
you with any help.  You could try posting to the users@httpd.apache.org mailing
list to see if anyone has ideas.
creator: slive@apache.org
